getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.p1: Welcome to KampanYES! Our app helps you discover the best deals from your favorite stores all in one place.
getting_started.p2: Download the app from the App Store or Google Play to get started. Create an account to personalize your experience and never miss exclusive discounts.

steps.step1: Browse organized folders to find deals from various stores and categories
steps.step2: Follow your favorite stores to get notified about new campaigns
steps.step3: Save deals you're interested in for quick access later
steps.step4: Share great deals with friends and family

q1.title: Is KampanYES free to use?
q1.body: Yes! KampanYES is completely free to download and use. We don't charge any subscription fees.

q2.title: How often are deals updated?
q2.body: Deals are updated in real-time as stores publish new campaigns. You'll always see the latest offers available.

q3.title: Can I use KampanYES offline?
q3.body: You can view previously loaded content offline, but you'll need an internet connection to see the latest deals and updates.

more_help.title: Need More Help?
more_help.p1: If you have questions that aren't answered here, please contact our support team at
